title: PlayStation Buys Spider-Man Dev - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.19.19
description:
IT FINALLY HAPPENED! Insomniac is officially part of the PlayStation first party stable.

Time Stamps - 
00:01:50 - Housekeeping
Thank you to Toronto!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:03:00 - PLAYSTATION BUYS INSOMNIAC
00:08:00 Best Friend Q. - Sony is to acquire Insomniac Games! I'm really excited about it, and it throws an interesting facet. For the past few years Insomniac have been making VR games like Edge of Nowhere, The Unspoken, Feral Rites and the upcoming Stormland exclusively for Oculus headsets. Do you think the acquisition means these titles will find their way to PSVR at some point? - KBABZ
00:11:15 Best Friend Q. - Exciting news announced today with Insomniac being acquired by Sony. Obviously this means Spider-Man 2 is basically confirmed but what do you think the focus of the studio is going to be. Will we see a lot of new IP or do you think we will see new entries in existing franchises such as Ratchet and Clank or even Resistance - Steven James Oslund
00:16:00 - NINTENDO
00:25:40 - STADIA
00:31:10 - Opening Night Live
00:47:40 - PUBG Cross-Play
00:49:26 - Stranger Things comes to Dead By Daylight, Matt Kim @ IGN
00:51:02 - Out today
00:56:00 -  WHCF & PM
Reader mail   -
00:58:33 - How possible is it that xCloud could also be implemented onto the Switch?  - DJBradChill
01:01:10 - I am on the fence about buying an Xbox One X or a Stadia Founders edition - David Scott
01:02:50 - Greg you made a big deal during the stadia stream on whether you would go from ps4 to stadia for the big triple A releases. My question is why not go to Xbox? - Tommy boy
01:05:50 - You‘re Wrong
This week’shost:
TUESDAY: Greg and Andrea
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Whitta
THURSDAY: Greg and Andrea
FRIDAY: Greg and Tim
GAMESCAST: Thursday, August 22nd @ 2 p.m.
Tim, Greg, Fran, Andrea
